newsitem.title: USA: Insci files for 15.9 mln shr offering.
newsitem.headline: Insci files for 15.9 mln shr offering.

text.p: INSCI Corp said on Monday it filed a Form S-1 Registration Statement with the Securities and Exchange Commission for 15,923,220 shares of common stock.

Of the shares being offered, 4,000,000 are reserved for acquisitions, 2,605,411 are from selling stockholders; and the balance of 9,317,809 are being registered for issuance for unit holders, convertible preferred shareholders, and warrant and option holders, INSCI said.
INSCI said the number of shares being registered is based upon certain underlying assumptions in the conversion of convertible preferred stock, warrants and options.
The number of shares outstanding was not immediately available.
